pr_title: banktags: save last opened tab when opening worn items

timeline.message:
banktags: fix render of incinerator when enabling it and staying in bank

Independent of all my previous commits (i.e. currently replicable in
master), given the situation when you open the bank with incinerator
disabled, enable the incinerator, and return to the main bank interface,
 the incinerator image is rendered larger than normal (normal being when
 you open the bank with incinerator enabled). This commit removes the
 error and, given the same situation, renders the incinerator as normal.

banktags: reassign trigger to recall tag tab when staying within bank

As per the suggestion, I changed the trigger that recalls the last tag
tab when switching interfaces within the bank, from checking that the
main bank interface is not hidden, to checking that one of two buttons
has been clicked, "Hide worn items" and "Hide menu". This must use the
invokeLater method because clicking either button changes the state of
isHidden but the client must complete that process before recalling the
saved tag tab. The behavior should remain the same as the last commit.

banktags: reassign trigger to recall tag tab when staying within bank

As per the suggestion, I changed the trigger that recalls the last tag
tab when switching interfaces within the bank, from checking that the
main bank interface is not hidden, to checking that one of two buttons
has been clicked, "Hide worn items" and "Hide menu". This must use the
invokeLater method because clicking either button changes the state of
isHidden but the client must complete that process before recalling the
saved tag tab. The behavior should remain the same as the last commit.

banktags: save search when clicking buttons that show a new panel

Co-authored-by: Ron Young <admin@ryoung.io>
banktags: simplify actions upon clicking hide equipment or hide menu

banktags: save last opened tab when opening worn items

Current code overwrites the last opened tab when opening the worn items
interface within the bank. The change treats the worn items interface as
 a hidden state of the tabs and modifies the conditions under which the
 last opened tab is saved and recalled. Switching among any interface
 within the bank should remember the last opened tab normally.

banktags: not overwrite last opened tab on first login after startup

Given the circumstance that you exit the bank and save the last opened
tab, close the client (not just log out), then launch the client and log
 in, current code overwrites the last saved tab after login. This
 solution adds a boolean that turns true and stays true only when the
 tab interface is, while not being hidden, initialized for the first
 time after client startup, i.e. when the bank is opened for the first
 time after client startup. The last saved tab should now keep its value
  between client sessions.

banktags: reassign trigger to save tag tab when staying within bank

As per the suggestion, I changed the trigger that saves the last tag tab
 when switching interfaces within the bank, from checking that the main
bank interface is hidden, to checking that one of two buttons has been
clicked, "Show worn items" and "Show menu". I added new constants as
necessary and adjusted parts of the relevant logic. The logic to recall
the saved tag tab remains the same, barring further suggestions.

banktags: remove duplication of widgets when staying within bank

From one of my previous commits, in the scenario where you start in the
main bank interface, click on either gear or settings, then return to
main bank interface, the code created duplicate widgets for upButton,
downButton, newTab and all tag tabs. This error was not visible unless
you right clicked on said widgets and found duplicate settings. The
change introduces an if block that differentiates the case of opening
the bank, and the case of switching among bank interfaces and returning
to the main bank interface. This should get rid of duplicates without
side effects.

banktags: fix render of incinerator when enabling it and staying in bank

Independent of all my previous commits (i.e. currently replicable in
master), given the situation when you open the bank with incinerator
disabled, enable the incinerator, and return to the main bank interface,
 the incinerator image is rendered larger than normal (normal being when
 you open the bank with incinerator enabled). This commit removes the
 error and, given the same situation, renders the incinerator as normal.

banktags: edit trigger to save tag tab when staying within bank

Added a corner case of clicking on the bank tutorial button when a tag
tab is selected to save tag tab.

banktags: reassign trigger to recall tag tab when staying within bank

As per the suggestion, I changed the trigger that recalls the last tag
tab when switching interfaces within the bank, from checking that the
main bank interface is not hidden, to checking that one of two buttons
has been clicked, "Hide worn items" and "Hide menu". This must use the
invokeLater method because clicking either button changes the state of
isHidden but the client must complete that process before recalling the
saved tag tab. The behavior should remain the same as the last commit.

banktags: save search when clicking buttons that show a new panel

Co-authored-by: Ron Young <admin@ryoung.io>
banktags: simplify actions upon clicking hide equipment or hide menu

banktags: search remembered search on panel close

Co-authored-by: Ron Young <admin@ryoung.io>

banktags: search remembered search on panel close

Co-authored-by: Ron Young <admin@ryoung.io>

timeline.author: raiyni

replies.bodyText: Disagree, but I will revert this only on the basis that it doesn't directly relate to this thread, but it makes improvements which I documented in 4333553, and this should be added in the future if not now.
replies.author: johannfrias

replies.bodyText: The listed code is no longer relevant and is unused.
replies.author: raiyni
